scripts.concat: ./scripts/concat.sh > dist/build.js && cp dist/build.js target/b.js && cp assets/*.bs target/
scripts.clean: rm target.zip; rm -rf dist/; rm -rf target/; mkdir -p dist target
scripts.gen: cp src/index.html target/index.html && cp dist/build.min.js target/b.js
scripts.zip: cd target; zip -r ../target.zip .; cd ..; wc -c target.zip
scripts.build-nominify: npm run clean && npm run compileglsl && npm run concat && npm run nominify && npm run gen
scripts.build-nominify-purejs: npm run clean && npm run concat && npm run nominify && npm run gen
scripts.build: export NODE_ENV=production; npm run clean && npm run compileglsl && npm run concat && npm run minify && npm run gen && npm run zip
scripts.watch: nodemon -e js,sh --watch src --watch scripts --exec npm run build-nominify;
scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run liveserver
scripts.concatlite: ./scripts/concat.sh > target/b.js && cp src/index.html target/index.html && cp assets/*.bs target/
scripts.watchlite: nodemon -e js,sh,html --watch src --watch scripts --exec npm run concatlite
scripts.lite: npm run watchlite & npm run liveserver
